title: Misc HOF tobacco cards for sale

posts.post_title: Misc HOF tobacco cards for sale
posts.post_content:
PM2 Speaker PSA 6 - sold

T202 Baker/Collins- vg appearance but sides look a little wavy -selling as trimmed - $85

T3 Crawford - VG but some paper separation on the top front. Not noticeable unless you were to pull on it - good way to get a HOFer at a reduced price.  - sold

PM to confirm

thanks
